text: The 2022 AFC U-23 Asian Cup will be the 5th edition of the AFC U-23 Asian Cup (previously the AFC U-23 Championship before rebranding from 2021), the biennial international age-restricted football championship organised by the Asian Football Confederation (AFC) for the men's under-23 national teams of Asia. The tournament will be held between 1–19 June 2022. A total of 16 teams will compete in the tournament. South Korea are the defending champions. Originally, it was determined that China would have hosted the tournament. However, it was announced on 15 October 2020 that they would withdraw from hosting the tournament due to scheduling conflicts, stadium completion timelines ahead of other international events and challenges created by the COVID-19 pandemic, and the AFC would reopen the invitation to host the final competitions of the 2022 and 2024 editions of the AFC U-23 Asian Cup. ==Qualification== Qualification matches are scheduled to be played between 23–31 October 2021. ==References== ==External links== *, the-AFC.com 2022 U-23 Asian Cup Category:2022 in youth association football Category:June 2022 sports events in Asia Category:Scheduled association football competitions
title: 2022 AFC U-23 Asian Cup
